catgU: LEARNING ADVICE & CONSULTING>SAP COURSES AND SCHEDULE INFORMATION
questionnaire:
Thank you for reaching us.
In order to help you more effectively request you to include the answers to as many of the following:
a. Are you new to SAP?
b. Do you want to undergo a SAP training program?
c. Which module / topics would you like to learn?
d. Please provide us as much information as possible to help you better
You can also visit training.sap.com for more details on our courses and certifications.

Thank you for reaching us.
